pageContext.claim: “‘The new House Resolution gives Adam Schiff (the most dishonest man in politics) the power unilaterally to release edited transcripts. Rule 10 gives Chairman Schiff absolutely no jurisdiction. Subpoenas issued as part of Dems’ Impeachment inquiry are illegal.’ Sam Dewey @FoxNews”
pageContext.analysis: The House voted to give Rep. Adam Schiff, the chairman of the intelligence committee, significant control of the impeachment process. But Republicans were in the room for all hearings, and Congress has well recognized investigatory powers to issue subpoenas and conduct oversight of the executive branch.
